sentences.en: A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。
他给我的前额涂上了油。

sentences.en: He bent forward and laid a kiss softly upon her forehead.
sentences.cn: 他弯身向前，在她额头上轻轻一吻。

sentences.en: He touched the boy's forehead. It was burning hot.
sentences.cn: 他摸了摸男孩的额头,烧得烫手.

sentences.en: He wiped away the beads of sweat on his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他擦去了额头上的汗珠。
她的前额纹着靛青色的刺青。

sentences.en: Midge's forehead furrowed as she saw that several were drinking.
sentences.cn: 米奇看到几个人正在喝酒时皱起了眉头。

sentences.en: Mike shook his head, to unstick his hair from his sweating forehead.
sentences.cn: 迈克晃了一下头，想把头发从汗涔涔的前额上甩开。

sentences.en: She brushed a lock of hair off his forehead.
sentences.cn: 她撩开他脑门上的一绺头发。

sentences.en: She dabbed iodine on the cuts on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她把碘酒轻搽在前额的伤口上。

sentences.en: She has a poor complexion and pock marks on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她满面菜色，额头上有些麻子。

sentences.en: She tapped her forehead and looked annoyed with herself.
sentences.cn: 她拍打着脑门，看上去在生自己的气。

sentences.en: Sweat ran from his forehead into his eyes, blurring his vision.
sentences.cn: 汗水从额头流到了眼睛里，模糊了他的视线。

sentences.en: The car struck him a glancing blow on the forehead.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车蹭伤了他的前额。

sentences.en: The wind blew her hair back from her forehead.
sentences.cn: 风把她前额上的头发吹到了后面。

trans.tran_en: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair
